title: fabber_dualecho
description: FMRIB's Advanced Bayesian Estimation and Inference tool for FMRI analysis.

data.title: Input Data
data.description: Specify a single input data file

data_order.title: Data Order
data_order.description: If multiple data files are specified, how they will be handled: concatenate = one after the other, interleave = first record from each file, then second, etc.

mask_file.title: Mask File
mask_file.description: Mask file. Inference will only be performed where mask value > 0

mt_list.title: Masked Time Points
mt_list.description: List of masked time points, indexed from 1. These will be ignored in the parameter updates

supp_data.title: Supplemental Data
supp_data.description: 'Supplemental' timeseries data, required for some models

options_file.title: Options File
options_file.description: File containing additional options, one per line, in the same form as specified on the command line

help_flag.title: Help Flag
help_flag.description: Print this usage method. If given with --method or --model, display relevant method/model usage information

list_params_flag.title: List Parameters Flag
list_params_flag.description: List model parameters (requires model configuration options to be given)

desc_params_flag.title: Describe Parameters Flag
desc_params_flag.description: Descript model parameters (name, description, units) - requires model configuration options to be given. Note that not all models provide parameter descriptions

list_outputs_flag.title: List Outputs Flag
list_outputs_flag.description: List additional model outputs (requires model configuration options to be given)

evaluate.title: Evaluate Model
evaluate.description: Evaluate model. Set to name of output required or blank for default output. Requires model configuration options, --evaluate-params and --evaluate-nt

evaluate_params.title: Evaluate Parameters
evaluate_params.description: List of parameter values for evaluation

evaluate_nt.title: Evaluate Number of Time Points
evaluate_nt.description: Number of time points for evaluation - must be consistent with model options where appropriate

simple_output_flag.title: Simple Output Flag
simple_output_flag.description: Instead of usual standard output, simply output series of lines each giving progress as percentage

overwrite_flag.title: Overwrite Flag
overwrite_flag.description: If set will overwrite existing output. If not set, new output directories will be created by appending '+' to the directory name

link_to_latest_flag.title: Link to Latest Flag
link_to_latest_flag.description: Try to create a link to the most recent output directory with the prefix _latest

load_models.title: Load Models
load_models.description: Load models dynamically from the specified filename, which should be a DLL/shared library

dump_param_names_flag.title: Dump Parameter Names Flag
dump_param_names_flag.description: Write the file paramnames.txt containing the names of the model parameters

save_model_fit_flag.title: Save Model Fit Flag
save_model_fit_flag.description: Output the model prediction as a 4d volume

save_residuals_flag.title: Save Residuals Flag
save_residuals_flag.description: Output the residuals (difference between the data and the model prediction)

save_model_extras_flag.title: Save Model Extras Flag
save_model_extras_flag.description: Output any additional model-specific timeseries data

save_noise_mean_flag.title: Save Noise Mean Flag
save_noise_mean_flag.description: Output the noise means. The noise distribution inferred is the precision of a Gaussian noise source

save_free_energy_flag.title: Save Free Energy Flag
save_free_energy_flag.description: Output the free energy, if calculated.

debug_flag.title: Debug Flag
debug_flag.description: Output large amounts of debug information. ONLY USE WITH VERY SMALL NUMBERS OF VOXELS
